comment.author: 40704503@N04
comment._content: What year was this taken?  If it is similar to the others...~1900, then the change in glacier size in greater than 100 years is drastic!

comment.author: 37547255@N08
comment._content: We don't know the exact year the photo was taken, but it's around the same time as the other photos in this set. And yes, the glaciers are rapidly shrinking in size, unfortunately.
